definition: written evidence, as opposed to oral evidence 口供[kou3 gong4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The testimony was consistent with the known facts.
sentences.chinese: 筆供與已知的事實相合乎。

sentences.english: His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 這份筆供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
